Sections.SectionText: HQ, this is Captain Sam reporting.
You can send the terraforming robot fleet now.
I've stabilized three planets. That's right - three!
The real estate in this part of the galaxy is about to get interesting -
ACKNOWLEDGED. TERRAFORMING FLEET DISPATCHED. ETA: 5 MINUTES
Great. Anyway, I was thinking of naming these planets the Planets of Sam -
Not after me, of course. After my favorite character in this game -
Wait, something's happening to the specimens I collected.
They're ... melding together. I'll call you back.
